title: Seasonal Sales Assistant Part-time
content:
Job Description - Sales Assistant
We are seeking an enthusiastic sales assistant to join our team on a part time bases to play a vital role in delivering exceptional customer service with opportunities to better there skills and development.
The JD group is the place to be if you are motivated by progression and interested in developing your career.
 
Key Details

Part-time hours 8 - 32 hours per week

 
Benefits

Incremental holiday allowance
Personal development opportunities to learn and develop in the business
Access to apprenticeships and accredited qualifications

 
What you'll be doing

As a part time sales assistant you be providing knowledge and seamless customer service to all that enter our branch
continuously maintaining clean and tidy stock standards on shop floor
ensuring stock is full and replenishing the sales floor for customers to purchase
collaborate with the team to achieve sales and targets collectively
